extension.description: A Kodi addon to browse and read manga from your Suwayomi-Server instance. Features include browsing your library, searching sources, reading chapters, tracking progress, and managing downloads.
extension.disclaimer: This addon requires a running Suwayomi-Server instance.
extension.news: v1.2.5 - Fixed page loading regression. Added fetchChapters to initialize manga from search/browse. Added extensive logging for debugging categories and pages.
